reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress comfortable, soft, and flattering, hugging them in all the right places, with one noting it's not spandex fitted.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute!
items.body: To be honest, I didn't have high hopes of what it was going to actually look like on, once I got it compared to what is shown in the listing photos. Most of the time when I order clothing from online, 75% of the time, it looks nothing like what is shown in the photos and always a disappointment. So I didn't hold my breath. But to my surprise it looked and fit just like what is shown in the photos! The quality is very good, not cheap. Doesn't stretch out and lose shape after wearing it for a while like some sweater materials do, which is nice! Material is super soft and fuzzy (not itchy at all ) and not too thick either, more like a medium weight. I ordered a size medium in black and the fit is perfect! Not too loose or too tight. I'm 5'7 and 135 lbs and a 36A/B with small hips. A lot of times the top area is too big or loose, or the hip area will be too loose due to the cut being designed more for the curvier type but not with this dress! I will say that the black isn't a true dark black, it's more on the charcoal black side but it's still nice either way. I will be ordering another one soon! Read more
items.author: Noelle Dionne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and beautiful
items.body: Beautiful sweater dress! It’s so soft and fits so perfectly! Im 5’3” weigh 178 a medium fits perfectly. It’s very stretchy. Read more
items.author: April L Kowal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it!
items.body: Great fit, good quality and lovely color. Read more
items.author: Lauren R Carroll

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just not for me
items.body: I would have loved this before having a baby, but I should have listened to the comments about how tight it is around the stomach area. I thought maybe black would be more forgiving but it was not! It was extremely soft and comfy, I just couldn’t pull it off. Read more
items.author: nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and style
items.body: loved the fit and the material is super soft!!! Read more
items.author: Joan Mizner

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: Color is different than pictured. I'm 5'3", 125 lbs, athletic, so it's not my body. I ordered a Medium in the blue - it was more like gray. The neck choked me and I have a small neck - can't imagine what it would feel like on a bigger neck? The biggest reason I'm returning it, aside from the neck, is that it has ribbing around the bottom like a sweater, so it just looks like an ill-fitting long sweather - not a dress at all. Just weird overall. If I had ordered a small, it may be fit better around my middle but then, it probably would have cut off my air entirely with that neck - ack! Read more
items.author: Busdawl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little different than anticipated
items.body: Not the right color, doesn't look as flattering as the photo. Is soft though. Read more
items.author: Clare

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have, I love it.
items.body: True to size and grate material. Perfect for church. Very soft. Not itchy. Very worm for the winter. Read more
items.author: Brianna James

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 13 Khaki, 06 Green, 20 Hot Pink, 05 Blue, 17 Olive Green, 12 Dark Khaki, 11 Red, 15 Dark Green, 19 Pumpkin, 07 Dark Brown, 08 Camel, 10 Dark Royal Blue, 02 Cream White, 18 Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
